name: Hotel Tycoon (itch)
description:
Welcome to Hotel Tycoon, a game where you'll have to build and manage a hotel. Build rooms as you wish, contract workers to run your hotel and create the best hotel ever created.

Feel free to join our Discord by clicking here!

Hotel Tycoon is still in early development, so there will be some bugs and great ideas. We would love to hear both of them, so you can write us on the community or send us an email at AvrGames@outlook.com. We're also on Twitter, follow us to know when will come the next update at @Avr_Games!

The background music is done by us, so don't be afraid of copyright infringements in YouTube videos!

Last version: Alpha 7 (click here to go to the devlog).
